increase/decrease
Decrease. That's what the lecturer said.

I suppose that's mostly because of teleportation. As you increase the amounts of nodes, there are more options to teleport to that are not the central node and cannot go to the central node. Do not take my word for it though. 

I also answered wrong. I thought it was stay the same.
